E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1986
Subject: I will retire
Hey Boss,
I will hang up the cleats after this season.
It was a great time, but my family needs me now.

Regards,
Chris Stinnett



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Status of Cristian Caudillo
Dear Sir,
Cristian Caudillo shouldn't play at AA New Britain Rock Cats!
He has an AVG of .248 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Progress of Paul Page
Dear Sir,
Paul Page has nothing more to prove at A Ft. Myers Miracle!
He has an AVG of .495 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/17/1986
Subject: Playing time
I'd like to complain about my playing time, I think
I am a pretty good player, so why am I no
regular in your lineups?

Regards,
Kendry España



Date: Monday, 5/19/1986
Subject: Progress of Timothy Drain
Dear Sir,
Timothy Drain has an AVG of .354 at AA New Britain Rock Cats!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1986
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Henry Hewett

Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Joe Cipolla

Date: Monday, 6/23/1986

I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.

Regards,
Tom Meagher

Your scouting director
